sourcesContent:
<template>
   <input type='number' placeholder="Enter the student Registration Number" v-model='reg_no' @blur='getName' required>
   <input type='name' placeholder="course_name" v-show='name_show' :value='name' disabled>
   <input type='number' placeholder="Enter the Course No" v-model='c_no' @blur='getCourse' required>
   <input type='text'  v-show="cname_show" :value='cname' disabled>
   <input type='text' placeholder="Enter the Marks" v-model="mark">
   <button> Click to Submit</button>
   
</template>

<script>
  import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  
    data() {
        return {
            name_show:false,
            cname_show:false,
            name:'',
            cname:'',
            reg_no:'',
            c_no:'',
            mark:''
        }
    },
    methods: {
        async getName() {
            axios.get(`http://localhost:8068/student/detail/${this.reg_no}`).then((res)=>{
                console.log(res.data);
                if(res.data.length==0) {alert("Invalid Register Number");this.reg_no='';return;}
                this.name=res.data[0].name;
                this.name_show=true;
            }).catch((err)=>{
                console.log(err);
            })
        },
        async getCourse() {
            axios.get(`http://localhost:8068/course/detail/${this.c_no}`).then((res)=>{
                console.log(res.data);
                if(res.data.length==0) {alert("Invalid Course Number");this.c_no='';return;}
                this.cname=res.data[0].name;
                this.cname_show=true;
            }).catch((err)=>{
                console.log(err);
            })
        }
    }

}
</script>

<style>

</style>
